Classic Modern Christmas Card with Photo

Top 10! Classic Modern Christmas Card with Photo – Christmas Cards Classic Modern Christmas Card with Photo products are in stock Classic Modern Christmas Card with Photo quality products and have the highest number of reviews in the same categoryThis Christmas photo card features a modern, yet festive design with a single prominent photo on the front. The background is a rich green, evoking a classic holiday vibe reminiscent of evergreen trees. Centered above or below the photo, the text "Merry Christmas" is displayed in a elegant and modern font in white providing a striking contrast against the green background. The simplicity of the single-photo layout allows the image to take center stage, making it perfect for a family portrait or a special moment from the year.

On the back of the card, there’s another photo, providing an opportunity to share a candid or additional memory. Beneath the photo, there is space for a personalized message, allowing you to include a heartfelt holiday greeting, express gratitude, or share your wishes for the coming year. The message can be customized to include the family name and the year, keeping the design cohesive and personal. Price:$1.86
